issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Thanks very much for the help guys. This installed without error with the addition of ros-groovy-pcl-conversions and ros-groovy-gazebo-msgs. Here's the Dockerfile I used:

```
FROM nsoong/ros

MAINTAINER Noonien Soong "iamdrsoong@gmail.com"

####### drcsim http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/Install ##################
RUN sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu precise main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-latest.list'
RUN sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.osrfoundation.org/drc/ubuntu precise main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/drc-latest.list'
RUN wget http://packages.ros.org/ros.key -O - | apt-key add -
RUN wget http://packages.osrfoundation.org/drc.key -O - | apt-key add -
RUN apt-get update
RUN apt-get remove gazebo-current sdformat
RUN wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
RUN apt-get install -y -q ros-groovy-pcl-conversions ros-groovy-gazebo-msgs gazebo-current
RUN dpkg -i ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
RUN apt-get install -y -q drcsim
```
Here's a link to the source ros container: https://index.docker.io/u/nsoong/ros/

Thanks again!
